name: API Design Patterns
title: REST API Design Patterns
description: Best practices and patterns for designing RESTful APIs, GraphQL, and gRPC services

axiomAlignment.A1_verifiability: OpenAPI schemas enable API contract verification
axiomAlignment.A2_user_primacy: REST conventions and resource naming prioritize consumer needs
axiomAlignment.A3_transparency: Clear API documentation makes interfaces explicit
axiomAlignment.A4_non_harm: Rate limiting, validation, and error handling prevent harmful usage
axiomAlignment.A5_consistency: Unified patterns for REST, GraphQL, WebSocket, and gRPC
